Trade/Device Name(s): iHealth BG5L wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
iHealth BG5 wireless Smart Gluco-Monitoring System
Specimen Type(s): Fresh capillary whole blood (fingertip, palm, forearm, upper arm, calf, thigh)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iHealth Align, BG5, and BG5L Smart Gluco-Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using enzyme-based meters and iOS application
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home to monitor the effectiveness of diabetes control by quantitatively measuring glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from multiple sites; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or neonatal use.
